languages.text: "Все, на чем лежит благословенная печать технологии, происходит из-под наших рук, и мы же следим, чтобы ритуалы эксплуатации соблюдались безукоризненно. Мы повсюду, мы — арматура Империума, скованная Марсом".

traits.locale_text: "Все, на чем лежит благословенная печать технологии, происходит из-под наших рук, и мы же следим за тем, чтобы ритуалы эксплуатации соблюдались безукоризненно. Адептус Механикус повсюду, мы — арматура Империума. Наша церковь владеет мирами и звездными флотами, а наш верховный иерарх, Генерал-Фабрикатор Марса, заседает в Совете Высших Лордов Терры".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."
languages.original_text: "Все, на чем лежит благословенная печать технологии, происходит из-под наших рук, и мы же следим, чтобы ритуалы эксплуатации соблюдались безукоризненно. Мы повсюду, мы — арматура Империума, скованная Марсом".

traits.locale_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from under our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. The Adeptus Mechanicus are everywhere, we are the reinforcing bars of the Imperium. Our church owns fleets and entire worlds, and our supreme hierarch, the Fabricator-General of Mars, has a seat in the Council of the High Lords of Terra."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from under our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. The Adeptus Mechanicus are everywhere, we are the reinforcing bars of the Imperium. The Adeptus Mechanicus is everywhere — we are the steel bars that give the Imperium strength. Our church owns fleets and entire worlds, and our supreme hierarch, the Fabricator General of Mars, has a seat in the Council of the High Lords of Terra."

The Adeptus Mechanicus is everywhere — we are the steel bars that give the Imperium strength. Our church owns fleets and entire worlds, and our supreme hierarch, the Fabricator General of Mars, has a seat in the Council of the High Lords of Terra."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Todo lo que tiene el sello bendito de la maquinaria procede de nuestras manos, y somos nosotros quienes nos aseguramos de que se lleven a cabo correctamente los rituales de operación. Estamos en todas partes; somos las barras de acero forjado en Marte que aportan solidez al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: «Todo lo que tiene el sello bendito de la maquinaria procede de nuestras manos, y somos nosotros quienes nos aseguramos de que se lleven a cabo correctamente los rituales de operación. Estamos en todas partes; somos las barras de acero forjado en Marte que aportan solidez al Imperium».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「機械の祝福の印が押されているすべてのものは我々の手で作られており、意図されたとおりに使用されるように保証している。我々はどこにでも存在する…我々は帝国に力を与える、火星で鋳造された棒鋼なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: 「機械の祝福の印が押されているすべてのものは我々の手で作られており、意図されたとおりに使用されるように保証している。我々はどこにでも存在する…我々は帝国に力を与える、火星で鋳造された棒鋼なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “所有带有机械祝福印记的东西都出自于我们之手，正是我们确保了操作仪式能够遵循应有的样子运行。我们无处不在，我们是火星锻造的钢筋，我们赋予帝国力量。”
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: “所有带有机械祝福印记的东西都出自于我们之手，正是我们确保了操作仪式能够遵循应有的样子运行。我们无处不在，我们是火星锻造的钢筋，我们赋予帝国力量。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce qui porte le saint sceau de la machine vient de nous, et c'est aussi nous qui veillons à ce que les rituels d'exploitation soient accomplis comme il se doit. Nous sommes partout ; nous sommes les barres d'acier forgées sur Mars qui confèrent sa force à l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce qui porte le saint sceau de la machine vient de nous, et c'est aussi nous qui veillons à ce que les rituels d'exploitation soient accomplis comme il se doit. Nous sommes partout ; nous sommes les barres d'acier forgées sur Mars qui confèrent sa force à l'Imperium. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Alles, was das gesegnete Siegel der Maschinerie trägt, stammt aus unseren Händen. Wir sind es auch, die sicherstellen, dass die Betriebsrituale wie vorgesehen durchgeführt werden. Wir sind überall. Wir sind die auf dem Mars geschmiedeten Stahlträger, die dem Imperium Stärke verleihen."
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was das gesegnete Siegel der Maschinerie trägt, stammt aus unseren Händen. Wir sind es auch, die sicherstellen, dass die Betriebsrituale wie vorgesehen durchgeführt werden. Wir sind überall. Wir sind die auf dem Mars geschmiedeten Stahlträger, die dem Imperium Stärke verleihen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış mühre sahip her makine bizim ellerimizden çıkmadır, faaliyet ayinlerinin gerektiği şekilde gerçekleştirilmesinden de biz sorumluyuzdur. Biz her yerdeyizdir. Bizler, Mars'ta dövülüp İmparatorluk'a gücünü veren çelik külçelerizdir."
languages.original_text: "Everything that bears the blessed seal of machinery comes from our hands, and it is we who make sure the operating rituals are performed as they were meant to. We are everywhere — we are the Mars-forged steel bars that give the Imperium strength."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış mühre sahip her makine bizim ellerimizden çıkmadır ve faaliyet ayinlerinin gerektiği şekilde gerçekleştirilmesinden de biz sorumluyuzdur. Biz her yerdeyizdir. Bizler, Mars'ta dövülen ve İmparatorluk'a gücünü veren çelik külçelerizdir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
